attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We believe that drivers should be concentrating on the road and not on their speedo while driving.

This is not a request for an email response as to why we cannot ban these cameras, but a demand for action

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "ban all average speed cameras."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20552


Prime Minister's Office
